notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: S.E.P.: Contribute formulations, concepts and partly wrote the manuscript. A.B.: Contribute formulations and ideas. J.P.: Contribute formulations and ideas. J.C.V.: Contribute formulations and ideas. T.T.: Contribute formulations, ideas and concepts and partly wrote aspects of the manuscript. G.A.C.: Direct the lab, instigate project/ideas and partly wrote the manuscript. All authors read and edited the final manuscript.
